bedrock_kb.chunks: Term life insurance provides coverage for a specific period. The policy pays a death benefit if the insured person dies during the term. Premiums are generally lower than whole life insurance.
Premium payments are due monthly on the policy anniversary date. A 30-day grace period applies to all payments. Late payments may result in policy lapse.
Policy LI-1234567 details: Term life insurance policy with monthly premium of $150.00. Coverage period is 20 years with a death benefit of $500,000.
Policy LI-7654321 details: Term life insurance policy with monthly premium of $200.00. Coverage period is 30 years with a death benefit of $750,000.

documents.content: Detailed information about payment processing, grace periods, and policy reinstatement.
